title.bibl: Sinai Congregation, Executive Board Minutes, October 30, 1905.

div.bibl: Sinai Congregation, Executive Board, Minutes, October 30, 1905.

body.p: A letter from Dr. Hirsch dated October 25, 1905, was presented representing that the Congress of Religions needed funds for its maintenance and that he had stated that Chicago Sinai Congregation could be depended upon for $500.00. After a discussion of the matter, it was concluded.....that the necessary amount would have to be raised by private subscription.
